line_1: Her eyes beam'd thanks, her cheeks spoke modesty;
line_2: He gaz'd, and left her with an ardent sigh.

line_1: And talk'st obscene by rules of Modesty.
line_2: With pious Heart thou studiest Vanity,

line_1: Wove by the gentle hand of Modesty;
line_2: Concealed she bids its latent terrors lie,

line_1: Wear the sweet blush of MODESTY;
line_2: He thus proceeded, these you see,
From all conceit, still wear it free,
Yet gain'd the king's approving eye;

line_1: But the sweet blush of Modesty
line_2: But the soft tear in Pity's eye
More than ATHENIA? in her gentle eye
